channel.title: Accessories on Welcome to Repair App Knowledgebase
channel.description: Recent content in Accessories on Welcome to Repair App Knowledgebase

item.title: How to add an additional accessories?
item.description: Click “Customers” Click “New” Click “Add" Click “New invoice” Add required details of additional purchase. Click “+” sign to add multiple items to the invoice Click “Save”. System will confirm your action, then click “OK”.
